entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
